author: {'steamid': '76561198138400885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 688, 'last_played': 1661023957}
review:
Enclave ist ein geradlinig verlaufendes Hack&Slay mit wunderbare Atmosphäre. 
Es war eines meiner ersten Spiele, welche eine teilweise (wenn auch gesciptet) zerstörbare Spielelemente aufweißt, was für damahlige verhältnisse Recht beeindruckend war. Das Spiel ist inmehrere Lvl und 2 Einzelspielerkampagnen. In der zweiten Kampagnen werden einige Lvl aus der ersten Stilvoll und sinnvoll wiederverwendet, was ich bis heute feier.
Bei Animation und Grafik hängt es heutigen Spielen natürlich weit hinterher.

Tipp: Googelt. Das spiel gibt es kostenloß.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011551145', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1673791065}
review: Игра сделана очень талантливо, с самого начала вас будет приветствовать нестандартное и уникальное меню с очень красивой музыкой, после чего вас ждет приключение за Свет и Тьму, то есть две абсолютно разные компании. В игре огромное количество персонажей за разные фракции, они конечно похожи, но визуально очень отличаются, здесь вам и воин и танк и маг и лучник, боец на любой вкус, сперва их всех нужно будет открыть, а потом можно смело пере пройти задания за любого бойца, так же в игре присутствует прокачка, ну это не совсем прокачка, а покупка брони и оружия для каждого война, а деньги зарабатываете исключительно находя огромное количество тайников. Задание очень разнообразные, уникальные и есть несколько боссов, как за Свет, так и за Тьму. Если честно я не совсем понял играешь ты за Тьму после компании за Свет или это альтернативная версия, но если честно это не серьезное замечание. В игре прекрасная боевка, персонаж слушается каждый клик мыши и нажатие клавиши. Музыка будоражат воображение и сложность игры вполне оправдана. Это отличное приключение которое рекомендую каждому и не обращайте внимание на устаревшую графику, привыкните после третьего задания. 8.5 из 10 Браво!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049157463', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1427893768}
review:
PRO:

-verschiedenen Waffen wie Schwertern, Äxten, Bögen oder auch Sprengstoff sowie Zaubersprüchen
-diverse Gegner 
-Zwischen den einzelnen Gebieten kann der Spieler neue Ausrüstung wie Waffen, Rüstungen und Heiltränke kaufen
-zwei Seiten, unterschiedliche Klassen:

Klassen von der Seite des Lichts:
Ritter
Jägerin
Druidin
Halbling
Ingenieur
Zauberer

Klassen von der Seite der Finsternis
Assassine
Zauberin
Berserker
Goblin
Bombardier
Lich

CONTRA:

-linear verlaufende Levels
-praktisch nicht vorhandenen Interaktionsmöglichkeiten
-sterilen Level
-schlechtes Speichersystem
-schlechte Wegfindung der Gegner 
-teils holprigen Animationen

author: {'steamid': '76561198167946980', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1387, 'last_played': 1542138490}
review:
Enclave me rappeler de bons souvenirs de l'époque xbox la mastoc boite noire, il y a toujours de l'action qui fait qu'on s'ennuie pas, les missions s'enchainent les gold s'accumule pour le stuff, le personnage progresse et devient balèze, plusieurs classes bien stereotyper: assassin, Berserker, mage, Guerrier, naingénieur ;)...
Les graphismes Pc sont meilleurs qu'a l'époque et les dialogues des personnages me font toujours sourire tellement ils sont ridicule, sinon bon défouloir heroic fantasy toujours agréable à play même des années plus tard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072137768', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1428502975}
review:
Enclave - игра разработанная шведской компанией  Starbreeze Studios в далёком 2002 году.Это первое творение Starbreeze Studios.Первая звёздочка.Потом был The Darkness и Syndicate.Хотя это уже другая история.


Enclave — праздник для любителей яркого и бесшабашного экшена от третьего лица. Игра вполне может заставить нас позабыть на два-три дня о бытовых проблемах и погрузиться в мир волшебных приключений.
В игре есть две стороны : свет и тьма.

Разнообразный игровой мир.Куда нас только не заносит,и заброшенные шахты,тюрьма,замки,дворцы,эльфийские леса и даже подводные жилища магов с призраками.Большой выбор оружия и персонажей.Любишь махать заточками?Не вопрос,бери рыцаря.Во дворе в детстве ты любил бегать с деревянным луком который вырезал тебе батя?И это можно,персонаж "Охотница" специально для тебя.И самое главное - хочешь хорошое оружие?Проверяй каждый уголок на наличие мешочков с монетками.На 2002 год графика и текстуры просто изумительны да и сейчас они ласкают глаз игрока.Огромное количество музыкальных треков,годная озвучка.Очень порадовали скриптовые сцены (например когда бежишь из тюрьмы и её бомбят какие-то эльфы-третьеклассники камни падают тебе на голову).

9.6 оргов из 10 возможных.

P.S 
А ведь в 2002 году мне было всего 4 годика. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198026050130', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 668, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1639739548}
review:
Dieses Spiel ist eigentlich nur noch etwas für Low Budget Nutzer. Story technisch ist es auch nur ganz okay.

Jeder der eine GTX 760 4GB VRAM sein eigen nennen kann oder nur eine 2 Dual Core ala Core2Duo E6xxx-8xxx, wird mit diesem Titel nicht besonders glücklich! 
Sehr alte Mechanik, welche ganz okay ist.. man kann es Spielen, ich würde es aber nur raten wenn man wirklich einen sehr schlechten PC/Laptop nutzen muss!

Ich habe diesen Titel nicht über meine Intel UHD 630 laufen lassen sondern es lieber mit meiner GTX 1660 TI 6GB VRAM..meine GTX sagte mir sogar das dieses Spiel 0% Ihrer leistung dauerhaft beanspruchen musste ROFL
Mit dem Forceware Settings auf Maximale Bildschärfe und MSAA 2x und game MSAA off sah das Spiel dann doch recht in Ordnung aus und machte Texturen mäßig sogar besseren eindruck als mein zuvor gespielter Titel "Duke Nukem Forever" was mich verwundert hatte da diese Titel dann doch 8 Jahre auseinander liegen was das Steam Datum mir preis gegeben hatte.

Alle anderen werden wohl gleich auf MMO´s etc umsteigen, da hat man doch schon einige Free Titel die deutlich besser sind auch ohne Echtgeld zu Investieren!

Ich würde dann doch auch lieber zu der Gothic, Earth Serie greifen oder Knightshift holen. Sind diese Titel doch um vieles besser vom Gameplay und haben ähnliche Anforderungen an die GPU!

Fazit: Nur für 10 Jahre alte Rechner/Laptop oder Liebhaber des Spiels . Alle anderen werden gnadenlos Frustriert vom Gameplay, enttäuscht von der Story und Augenkrebs von der Grafik bekommen! Ich Empfehle es aus einem Grund, es war und bleibt ein Klassiker der nicht so bekannt ist.


Gespielt auf diesem Laptop System: https://valid.x86.fr/4zvdwc

author: {'steamid': '76561198068937354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1144, 'last_played': 1637879512}
review:
La realidad es que Enclave es uno de esos títulos que con una trama desarrollada de manera simple y con algunas lagunas,  vista desde dos perspectivas (campaña de la luz y superada esta, continúa con la oscuridad), con escenarios variados, gráficos decentes para su tiempo y una inteligencia artificial más que cuestionable, consigue que te olvides de todo esto con una jubabilidad en la que necesitarás adaptarte al entorno y usar el personaje adecuado. 

Dispone de tres modos de dificultad y cada facción cuenta con una serie de personajes que van desde Caballero, Mediano o Mago hasta Goblin, Asesino o Hechicera, con un sistema de personalización basado en desbloquear nuevo equipamiento con el oro y diamantes que vayamos encontrando. En definitiva, si lo pillas de oferta (o gratis en mi caso), no te defraudará siempre y cuando no tengas las expectativas por las nubes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000604423', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1425497432}
review:
Ein schönes Spiel, das schlecht gealtert ist. Ich habe es vor Jahren gespielt als es noch halbwegs aktuell war, doch mittlerweile ist alles, was "Enclave" spielenswert macht, in ausgefeilterer Form in anderen Spielen enthalten. 
Die Story empfand ich schon damals als ziemlich plump - zusammengeschusterter Fantasyquatsch eben. (Ich liebe Fantasy - aber warum muss man sich innerhalb von Subgenres immerzu auf ausgelatschen Pfaden bewegen? Eine Frage, die hier zu erörtern den Rahmen wohl sprengen würde...)
Schön ist, dass man in Enclave schnell zwischen einzelnen Charakteren wechseln kann. Die Level haben tatsächlich einen hohen Wiederspielwert, da man das in ihnen versteckte Gold braucht um die Charaktere auszurüsten, um mit diesen dann auch in späteren Leveln bestehen zu können.
Das allein ist für mich jedoch kein Grund eine Kaufempfehlung auszusprechen. Wer es, wie ich, kostenlos erhält, kann es sich jedoch gerne anschauen - totale Zeitverschwendung ist es noch lange nicht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198184552887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1804, 'last_played': 1446472370}
review: Enclave is a Real under rated Hack n Slash RPG Gem... I played it on the XBOX A Long Time Ago and after configuring the controls to my liking and setting the graphic to 1080P... I am totally digging it....It has a neat 1st person 3rd person camera switch that makes your shield, Sword, Bow transparent in 1st person mode..... its one of the little things that make this game different. Some have reported an adware in the game but I havent seen any of that. The game Runs Great and with it on sale less than a Dollar its a steal. As you collect gold in the levels you buy better gear and you can replay the levels after you complete them with any unlocked character to look for the missed gold. There are both light and dark campaigns to unlock 2 hidden characters not seen in the campaign and there is a config hack to unlock console commands but it is reccommended to back up your save before you try it. Also a level editor exists for the game, which has been updated if you look for it... I really wish the MOD community gave this game some Love....Do yourself a favor and add it to your collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012934956', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 195, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1428431531}
review:
An old school action-adventure game.  It's old, so don't expect anything ground breaking.  Premade characters with premade fighting styles that get upgrades as you progress through the story & earn money.  The combat is hack/slash with different styles between which character you choose to play.  There are archers & mages which play like a 1st/3rd person shooter of sorts.  Just make sure you have mana before starting fights.  Enemies don't have much variation between them.  You'll encounter the same types throughout every level with them getting harder & more armored as you progress.

STORY

There isn't really a good story here.  It's mostly about you being in a war & your leader telling you to go do stuff.  There are good & evil stories to play through but you can't play the villain story until you beat the good one which is a bummer.

GRAPHICS

Don't expect much visually since it's an older game.  It's not bad looking but everything does look brown/grey.  Like they were going for a more realistic tone.  It's pretty bland & boring overall.  The character models look good at least.

AUDIO

Nothing major here either.  The game does have basic 3D surround sound, but I'm not sure how it is since I don't have a setup for it.  Music is generic & loops through the levels.  Voice acting is good & tolerable.  Sound effects are basic explosions, clangs, footsteps, etc.  Nothing super impressive.

UI

There is no map in this game, but levels aren't that big so you won't really get lost.  Before each mission you equip your character with weapons & armor. You choose the missions to play via a world map.  Each mission is repeatable but you can't earn bonus gold from replaying each mission unless you earn more gold than you did in your previous playthrough.  Depending on how much gold you've earned you can equip yourself with better items & more potions.  You don't really "BUY/SELL" stuff in this game.  You find gold throughout the levels & it adds to your total gold pool.  The higher your gold pool the more you can equip.

GAMEPLAY

The gameplay changes depending on the classes & there are 3 class types.  Warrior, Archer, & Mage.   You start with the warrior & unlock the rest as you play the game.  You unlock different versions of each as you progress as well.

WARRIORS  The combat can get cumbersome for warriors.  You'll need to be constantly moving & attacking to avoid being hit & to get around some enemies defenses.  The Warrior is tall & a lot of your enemies are short so you'll keep swinging over their heads from time to time. He also often swings at an odd angle so even if the enemy isn't short you'll still miss.  You can use shields to block arrows & attacks, just make sure they hit the shield or you'll take damage.

ARCHERS  They play pretty much like you'd expect.  You have to draw & time your shots.  Headshots do 10x bonus damage & are pretty much instant kills.  You get a variety of arrows like fire, explosive & sniper arrows.  Gameplay is slightly different depending on what bow you use.  You pretty much need to headshot enemies & that's easier said than done.  Each shot has a delay as well.

MAGES  Mages equip staves & shoot things similar to the archers except they are more versatile. Each attack uses mana & their playstyle changes depending on which staff you're using.  The 1st staff is the most balanced.  A slow attack with a wide berth to give you room for errors.  The 2nd staff requires much more precision & is similar to using a bow without needing to draw an arrow.  The 3rd staff poisons your enemies & allows you to damage them over time.  Some enemies are immune/weak to certain staves so it's best to bring 2 staves with you if you can afford it.

OVERALL

The game is monotanous & poorly designed.  

The enemy AI is terrible & goes from being completely stupid to jump around & avoid all your attacks while they bash your face in.  If you play a ranged character you're gonna have a hard time because the enemies are constantly moving & have tiny heads and you NEED to headshot them in order to kill them.  If you play a melee character you're gonna have an even worse time because every enemy is so small your swings will always go over them or he'll just swing at wierd angles so if the enemy isn't short you'll miss anyways.  

The levels are really linear as well.  It's pretty much a straight line, with one offshoot that unlocks if you can save someone from dying & some dead ends that hide more gold.  Enemies also spawn out of no where.  You'll often walk through an area with no enemies only to have them spawn behind you.

The games not unplayable, but it is frustrating.  I'd not recommend it unless you get it on a good sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145239055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1427452401}

author: {'steamid': '76561198104277452', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1427350597}
review:
И так с чего хочу начать, эта игра досталась мне почти бесплатно, ну думаю я давай попробую что за очередной шлак попался. Захожу в игру менюшка... ну так себе, ну я думаю - Да ну нафиг щас раз сыграю и всё. Запускаю игру начало так себе было не понимал что к чему, но игра притянула своей простотой она достаточно сложная но в ней разберётся даже маленький ребёнок, да и графон приличный для её лет-то. Затянула она меня, я полностью её прошёл и не жалею, да кстати сюжет какой-никакой есть, и если вчитаться вы всё поймёте но в кратце:
 Вы играете за мужика каторого как и в скайриме посадили за кражу чего-то там, мы выбираемся и идём спасать мир от наподения всяких орков, гоблинов и т.д. Вот весь сюжет, но я много не рассказал это вы увидите в самой игре.
 Закончил играть в неё я с улыбкой на лице игра настолько прикольная ну что ппц, и после того как вы закончите игру откроется особый персонаж, советую и за него поиграть.
Теперь к оценкам:
 Сюжет: 9.9/10
 Гемплей: 8/10
 Графика: Не для графодротов но для своего года бомба!
 Боссы: Куча боссов 10/10
 Персонажи: Их тоже куча 10/10
И так... тем кто дочитал мой обзор особый подарок ниже будет 2 кода с игрой, не ленитесь проверьте все, а вдруг вы первый читаете мой обзор.
1. 9L3BW-AHAPH-GN0KP
2. DWMK8-TWFJP-DMXQX

author: {'steamid': '76561198063489127', 'num_games_owned': 2158, 'num_reviews': 380, 'playtime_forever': 409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1427398690}
review: Die Grafik ist natürlich schlecht, aber etwas anderes kann man von so einem alten Game auch nicht erwarten. Positiv ist vor allem, dass man oft Wahlmöglichkeiten hat, was man wie machen möchte und man kann zu Beginn sogar entscheiden, ob man eine Kampagne des Lichts oder der Finsternis spielen möchte. Das Spiel ist auch abwechslungsreich, da man sowohl Nahkämpfer als auch Fernkämpfer sein kann oder auch Zauberer. Es kann natürlich nicht mit neueren Games mithalten, aber wen die schlechte Grafik nicht stört, dem ist es zu empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056536414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 423, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1601699044}
review:
Ce jeu à première vue semble pertinent comme bien d'autres... mais je fus impressionné avec son histoire et sa simplicité. Voilà un bon petit mmo comme dans la belle époque, quoique le visuel soit vieux comme Mathusalem, mais ceci fait son charme, également riche en couleur. Les points forts de ce petit jeu qui ma couter 0.58 cents ma divinement surprient. La possibilité de jouer seulement solo améliore l'intérêt tout en restant tranquille sans limite de temps. Alors si vous cherchez un petit mmo à très faible prix... je vous le recommande vivement. 

Amicalement
Le pasteur

author: {'steamid': '76561198105575918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 749, 'last_played': 1598887120}
review:
Плюсы+
Неплохая графика несмотря на то что игра вышла очень давно.
Прикольно бегать по уровню и собирать монетки/искать тайнички.
Разносторонние классы и уровни некоторые уровни влёгкую проходятся каким то классом, а каким то нет.
Кроме сюжетных миссий представлена арена на которой можно найти дополнительные средства на экипировку.
Минусы- 
Кликательная боевая система т.е ударил отбежал, ударил отбежал.
Маленький набор магии у мага зависящий от посоха.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040736490', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1427204626}
review:
Where should I start about this game.
It cost me €0,69 and my life has been changed.
It all began in the main menu when I was going to start a new adventure.
The game gave me a choice if I wanted to play the light or dark campaign, because I'm an edgy guy I wanted to choose the dark campaign.
Up untill this moment I thought the game was fine but then when I wanted to pick the dark campaign I couldn't because it was unavailable for some reason.
Well alright I'll go with the light campaign not what I wanted to but oh well.
Then I spawned and some random chick got blown up and then just disappeared.
The moment I found out that collecting the maximum amount of gold each quest was more interesting then the quests and the whole storyline my whole view of the game was changed.
This isn't an ordinary RPG, this game was made to see if you're persistent enough to collect all the gold.
But this game does not only have action it also has some Mirror Edge like parkour.
So not only can you fuck up ugly goblins you also run around collecting gold like a maniac.

12/10 Would play again for dark campaign gold collecting.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971468331', 'num_games_owned': 2411, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1427094338}
review:
This isn't an RPG at all,  its a typical hack and slash action game.  There has barely any loot accept gold and health pots and very rarely a particular level will reward you with an upgraded item for the various characters you'll unlock as you progress.  The combat is a mess with button bashing the par for the game, blocking serves limited purpose as you'll be wildly swinging your weapon around hoping for actual contact with enemies, sometimes it doesn't even register.

The defence Enclave has is its age, its quite old now - but even so, back in 2003 there was RPGS around that did a better job in the third person action rpg genre.   Levels are all extremely linear in nature, and some areas are quite confusing and its easy to get lost and frustrated.

Graphics wise, its above par considering its age - this is probably why it got so many positive reviews.  But in terms of actual gameplay, its sub-par and the difficulty increases quite rapidly to a point you'll rage over cheap deaths from traps or other stupid game mechanics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135900453', 'num_games_owned': 233, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1426674987}
review:
Удивительная и приятная игра, если вернутся в те года, когда она вышла на этот свет. Даже в тот момент, большинство журналов давало игре 8 из 10 балов и причем заслуженно. 

Я думал поиграю парочку уровней или пройду игру без энтузиазма, но все не так! Я очень увлекся, что даже собирал всё золото по всем уровням, открывал все тайники и секреты. Новых персонажей. Игра очень увлекла в свой мир.

Сюжет игры не слабый и причем увлекательный, мир игры сопровождается отличными музыкальным сопровождение. Нам в игре всегда дают выбор - кем играть, что одеть и снарядить. 

От сложности игры, менялся только AI (искусственный интеллект) врага, он стрелял метче и становился проворнее. Система боя тоже удивила, я так привык к играм в которых была целенаправленная точность ударов и блокировок. Нужно самому рассчитывать замах удара для попадания и маневрировать, чтобы успеть поставить блок. 

P.S. Спасибо разработчикам Topware за увлекательный мир 2003 года, который был в то время на высоте. Рекомендую всем игрокам, которые поймут игру прошедших времен.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044337564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1426627678}
review:
This game is far better than I expected, when I first bought it on sale I expected a cheaply made, linear rpg.
What I ended up getting was a well-made dungeon crawl that keeps me very entertained; with classic graphics, simple controls and easy but fun combat coupled with a complex story and some great voice acting, I find this is definitely a game for the western rpg fan or anyone who wants a return to the classic games of the late 90s and early 2000s

If I had to make a complaint it is only that the game requires some back-tracking but it keeps it relatively interesting with events that only occur when you return to various areas and creating reasons to explore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142472664', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1426610907}
review: Having read some of the other reviews, the game has never directed me to purchase another game. That being said, I cannot sit here and play a game that cannot register attacks properly. After attempting to kill one of the early and easily killable enemies near the beginning of the game for a full 5 mins before I accomplished it, I really have no reason to recommend this game. You would be more frustrated at the game instead of being able to enjoy what could have been a really good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156824419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1043, 'last_played': 1428822553}
review: я помню как ещё в детстве играл в анклав.Для меня это была просто босподобная игра тех времён (правда в то время она была для меня весьма сложной,потому-что я играл в неё тогда где то лет в 9-10).Однако даже сейчас моё мнение по прежнему не изменилось,так как даже для таких лет её графика остаётся весьма приемлимой,и геймплей весьма удобен.Сразу скажу-особого сюжета здесь нет.Однако кто сказал что для такой игры вообще нужен хороший сюжет? Всё что тебе нужно-это либо играть за добро и уничтожать все тёмные силы на своём пути (а их разновидность весьма неплоха), либо же играть за тьму и уничтожать всех светлый существ на своём пути (а их тоже не мало).Ну чтож,подведём итог:с моей точки зрения эта игра достойна 7 из 10 баллов

author: {'steamid': '76561198096888128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1426369566}
review:
Die Grafik ist nicht mehr auf dem neuesten Stand, aber dennoch ordentlich.
Im Sale zugegriffen für unter einem Euro - da kann man auf keinen Fall was falsch machen.
Story ist nicht so sehr vorhanden, aber das ist auch nebensächlich.
Der Soundtrack ist gut und eingängig.
Das einzige, was negativ zu erwähnen ist, ist die fehlende Speichermöglichkeit. Einmal begonnen muss ein Level auch beendet werden, um den Fortschritt nicht zu verlieren. Und die Levels können schon mal 30-40 Minuten lang sein.
In den Levels gibt es spärlich gesät Checkpoints. Hat man diese erreicht, wird man immer wieder belebt ohne Nachteile.

Im Sale ist das Spiel zu 100% zu empfehlen, ansonsten darf veraltete Grafik nicht stören.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982506006', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1426353756}
review:
Zunächst sollte ich erwähnen dass ich Enclave konstenlos durch eine Promotion erhalten habe.

Das Spiel beginnt mit Erzählungen und Videosequenzen. Bedingt durch das Alter des Spiels fallen einem sofort einige Makel auf, diese sind zum Glück nicht allzu wichtig und die Engine macht einiges her.
Die Welt ist nicht so detailreich und fühlt sich wirklich leer an.
Die Leere wird durch die instanzierten Level verstärkt. Der Spieler kann jedes Level beliebig oft spielen und alles erkunden, ihm stehen später auch andere Charaktere zur Seite.

Das Kampfsystem finde ich persönlich sehr schlecht, obwohl es einem auch Freude bereiten kann. Als Krieger reicht es aus wenn man vor und zurück rennt und währenddessen angreift, so besiegt man nahezu alle Feinde und wird selber kaum getroffen.
Der Fernkampf kann sehr effektiv sein, allerdings machen nur Kopftreffer richtig schaden und Körpertreffer machen relativ wenig Schaden, besonders bei Magiern.
Das Zielen ist zum Teil eine Katastrophe, sowohl im Nah- als auch im Fernkampf.

Allgemein kann ich das Spiel nicht weiterempfehlen, konnte mich kaum dazu begeistern weiter zu spielen und ich war immer froh wenn der Level endlich geschafft war.

author: {'steamid': '76561198175297365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1424307997}

author: {'steamid': '76561198076633174', 'num_games_owned': 1819, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1426284848}
review: В принципе только одна существенная претензия: какая это нахрен РПГ??? Чем упоролись рецензенты того времени и игроки, что приписали ролевые элементы этому слэшеру? Ни прокачиваемых умений, ни прокачки самой по себе, тут даже гребанных диалогов нету, одно наличие которых вкупе с отыгрышем - позволяет абсолютному большинству игроков приписывать игры к жанру РПГ, здесь же одни кат-сцены. Или мне теперь какой-нибудь Lord of the Rings: Тhe Return of the King считать ролевой игрой - только из-за возможности выбора персонажа?

author: {'steamid': '76561198078857295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1572032647}
review:
Dieses Spiel ist einfach ein Traum *__* 

Obwohl es leider nur 10 Stunden Spielzeit beinhaltet lohnt es sich für das Geld. Die Grafik muss man bedenken ist aus dem Jahre 2003 aber lässt sich gerne noch anschauen. Das Spiel beinhaltet alles was man für ein gutes RPG braucht. 

~ Ein Klasseneditor 
~ Stärker werdende Gegner
~ Abwechslungsreiches Leveldesigne ... und nicht so ein Copy and paste shit 

Dieses Spiel muss man als RPG fan spielen ... Es ist einfach ein Traum #nohomo ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198031225726', 'num_games_owned': 340, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1425849263}
review:
[h1]The Look[/h1]
*If you have a fetish for graphic then is maybe not for you because is from year 2003
+Turn up the setting if you want 
*Never played "Gothic 1" but the properties are similar: medieval, third-person-view
*You start as Knight and can playing as that for each other Chapter

[h1]Some facts[/h1]
+More Classes get unlocked and each Chapter is aviable to repeat
*You can colect coins; Health potion (medicine in a bottle); hidden ammo (unless you using melee-weapons or magic)
*If you respawn from a Checkpoint- you don't win back your ammo (important as Hunter). Just repeat the Chapter than
*Amazing Menu with that Crow
*Because is from year 2003 they don't have Game-Pad support/option (Could be a good "Play Station 2" title)

[h1]Summary[/h1]
10/10. Perfect mechanism with a big world in Chapters (and with funny glitches)

review:

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198003878190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 833, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1425384856}
review:
-: herná doba, lineárne úrovne, bugy, umelá inteligencia, miestami nuda, príbeh, absencia multiplayeru, atmosféra

+: grafika, efekty, hudba, postavy, príjemný pohľad na pozadie hrdiniek, rozdelenie kampane, menu, boj s bosmi, obchod, zbrane

Verdikt: Enclave v žiadnom prípade nie je RPG, ale maximálne akčná hra s prvkami RPG hier. Po technickej stránke je na tom celkom slušne, čo sa prejavilo príjemným pohľadom na pôvabné pozadie niektorých hrdiniek. Negatívom hry je však celkový obsah. Enclave je veľmi krátka hra, ktorú možno dohrať behom 4 hodín, respektíve jej obe časti kampane. To by mohol ešte zachrániť multiplayer, ale ten hra neobsahuje. V hre dokonca nemáte šancu zablúdiť pretože úrovne sú totálne lineárne a miestami až nudné. Umelá inteligencia nie je nič extra a sama v prvom rade bojuje s problémami, ktoré jej spôsobuje samotná hra v podobe bugov. Z nudy dokážu vytrhnúť súboje s tuhšími nepriateľmi. Celkovo je Enclave iba priemernou akčnou hrou s RPG prvkami, ktorá mohla byť lepšia, ak by autori namiesto práce na detailoch ženského pozadia popracovali radšej na multiplayeri.

59%

author: {'steamid': '76561198011965365', 'num_games_owned': 2434, 'num_reviews': 2080, 'playtime_forever': 733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 733, 'last_played': 1425423493}

review:
It's got a good storyline and fairly interesting lore,and exploring feels very rewarding at some times.
There's not much character progression though,I've pretty much only used the knight as far as I've played.
But the fact that you just unlock a character and buy gear for it,
and then get to jump straight into the game is very nice however.
The game is very challenging at some times,even in "easy" difficulty,
but thanks to that,it just makes the game more interesting and more fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992688801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1425153758}
review:
Damals noch auf einem PC gespielt  , der jetzt sogar schon schlechter als mein Android Handy ist.^^

Wer auf alte Spiele steht und wem die alte Grafik nicht allzu sehr stört  - würde ich das Spiel empfehlen.

5€ sind vollkommen angemessen und wer sich nicht schlüssig ist - kann ja auf einen Sale warten (wo man das Spiel schon fast umsonst bekommt ^^)

author: {'steamid': '76561198119057803', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1425694725}

author: {'steamid': '76561197992690466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 444, 'last_played': 1425140501}
review:
Bonjour.
Ce jeu est à prendre à la légère, sinon on se surprendrait à se faire des réflexions du genre :
-Pourquoi les golems de lave brûlent ils dans la lave ? 
-Le gobelin m'attendait-il dans ce meuble depuis 6 ans ou a-t-il eut une vision du future pour prévoir mon arrivée ?
-Une fois, j'ai récupéré de la santé en mettant les pieds dans l'eau. Pourquoi cela ne s'est il jamais reproduit ?
-Les gens parlent réellement de cette façon dans une autre dimension ?
-Je sauve la reine et son château mais j'ai pas payé mes impôts, alors il faut que j'aille jusqu'en enfer tuer Satan pour racheter ma dette... Logique non ?
-Chevalier brutal avec une grosse épée, une grosse hache ou encore un gros gourdin plein de piquants fait moins de dégât qu'une sorte d'elfe en string avec un bâton magique !
-Ouille .. aie ... oulala j'ai mal, vite ! Un gorgée de vin rouge et c'est reparti :D
-Pourquoi cette porte m'a tué?
-Oh putain ... encore une échelle ...
Bref... !!

En clair :
Le jeu est plutôt cool au final puisque je l'ai fini et je me suis bien amusé !

Point par point :
-Les dialogues :
Mon dieu... les dialogues sont horribles!! Personne ne s'exprime de cette façon ou sur ces intonations! Entre Marcus qui a un talent divin pour prévoir les embuscades " Je sens qu'il va y avoir une embuscade." BIM ! Embuscade ! La princesse qui pousse des cris aigu avec une voie de raton laveur castré et furieux, les mages complètement bourrés, rempli de vin rouge "Haa tu craindras mon courOoOoOoux !"," J'appelle la force des élémeEeeeeEnts BoOoOouhaaAaaaAaa...". Les dialogues sont très répétitifs et très nuls, vide de contenu ou apportant des réflexions évidentes, le tout avec un vocabulaire qui n'existe pas !
+. De plus, les écrits ne sont pas toujours traduits, du genre : " Trouver la clef.","You need a key to open the door".

-Le gameplay :
Au corps à corps, c'est l'enfer! Une marche, un escalier, une pente, n'importe quoi qui vient apporter un relief vient fausser la Hitbox et vous tapez dans le vent! Votre adversaire, lui, en revanche, ne vous rate pas! Vous frappez furieusement avec votre épée dans tous les sens à parfois plus de 2 coup par seconde pour, au final, vous rabattre sur la veille méthode du : "J'avance pour mettre un coup, mais je recul pour esquiver, et je répète en boucle." C'est dommage! Les personnages corps à corps sont intéressant mais on ne peut pas les jouer correctement.

A distance, tout s'éclairci tout à coup. Le DPS est largement correct, voir plus élevé que les classes corps à corps et vous permet de rester "safe", ne pas perdre de vie et tuer vos ennemies tranquillement. Le jeu est énormément plus simple avec un vieux bâton de bois des ténèbres qu'avec une énorme hache du meilleur forgeron de l'espace.
+. De plus, j'ai remarqué, lors des premières missions coté ténèbres qu'on est parfois dans des situation à la con du genre : 
Je ne dispose que d'un arc et, COMME PAR HASARD, dans cette mission il y a des gars en armure avec un gros bouclier qui bloquent mes flèches! N'ayant pas d'arme de mêlée pour combattre je suis obligé de les laisser me mettre un coup d'épée pour pouvoir leur tirer une flèche... C'est pas de bol ! Et je n'ai que deux choix : 1. Je me fais chier à finir le niveau entier comme ça. 2. Je recommence tout depuis le début pour préparer mon stuff.

Les déplacements ne sont pas horrible, ça va, c'est plutôt dynamique etc ... Y'a juste les échelles qui sont mal foutus. Suite à un combat endiablé avec 3 truands de l'enfer, après avoir bien transpiré, avoir perdu du sang et vaincu vos ennemies... il vous faudra encore monter cette échelle, un défis plus dur encore !!
Aussi, j'ai parfois surpris des PNJ complètement fou qui sautent dans tous les sens pour monter une marche ou franchir un petit obstacle... C'était marrant jusqu’à ce que je me rende compte que je suis obligé de faire exactement la même chose! Et d'ailleurs ... Se coincer entre 2 marches d'escalier pendant qu'on vous bombarde de flèches c'est pas toujours marrant! Aussi, il y a des petites interactions pratiques et sympa du genre : Clique droit pour sortir de l'eau .. Ouf!

L'IA est très basique, suffisante mais pas terrible .. Les ennemies, parfois, entrent dans une sorte de frénésie et lors d'un combat sautent par dessus un rempart et vont s’aplatir tout seul au pied de celui ci pour je ne sais quelle mystérieuse raison... ils avaient peut être peur ! Les grenadiers sont débiles, ils tirent des bombes partout " HAAAAAA JE SUIS UN PNJ COMPLETEMENT TAREEEEEEEEE !!!!! " .. Et ... Ils tirent rarement des bombes sur nous! Aussi, certains mobs ont une hitbox mal définie et pour les distants, ce n'est pas toujours facile de trouver le point d'impact déterminant qui permettra de tuer tel ou tel mob, par exemple : Les espèces de singe touffu on une hitbox au pied, leur tirer en pleine figure ne les affectent pas, non, il faut leur casser les jambes ! Puis encore, en avançant dans le jeu on rencontre des archers qui tirent des flèche 3 par 3 ou 5 par 5 .. C'est bien beau tout ça mais le problème c'est que si celui ci vous allume au corps à corps ( Ce qui peut arriver ci vous le croiser à l'angle d'une ruelle sombre et lugubre ! ) et qu'il vous tire dessus, vous prenez les 5 flèches d'un coup ! ONE SHOT !!

Level design :
Là, par contre, je n'ai pas trouver grand chose a redire. Pour l'époque je trouve ça beau, c'est propre. Pas vraiment de bugs de textures superposées, de "trou" menant au néant du moteur graphique. C'est plutôt bien réalisé, les bâtiments sont grands, bien fournis. Les textures de bibliothèques sont sympa, les meubles aussi... C'est bien de voir que les portes peuvent s'ouvrir dans les 2 sens et que certains éléments du décor peuvent se détruire. Les level designer n'ont pas était faignant pour la réalisation de tout ça !

En revanche, il a des tableau qui sont super "kitch" du genre : Tableau de 2 m² représentant une princesse guerrière blonde avec des gros seins en face d'une photo d'une vierge qui prend la pose de la Joconde.. Sérieusement, qui mettrait ça dans son salon ? ça n'existe pas !

Aussi, là ou j'ai ressenti un peu de "flemme" de la part des level designer, c'est sur les fameuse zones dans lesquelles on a pas le droit d'aller qui affichent une message par défaut : "Abandon de la mission dans 5..4...3..2......" C'est baclé ! De même pour les murs invisibles empêchant le joueur de sortir de la map ou de s'enfoncer trop loin dans la foret.

Les "bonus" sont complètement "obvious" , on en vient de se dire : Est ce que je vais chercher les pièces d'or secrètement cachées à droite et à gauche du château ... ? Ou est ce que je m'en fou complètement de je trace mon chemin ?" Parce qu’on sait qu'il y a des pièces cachées toujours aux mêmes endroits, ce n'est pas du tout subtil.

Le gestion de l'inventaire est cool ! Pas la peine de se tracasser à se demander s'il est rentable ou non d'acheter tel ou tel produit avant de commencer une mission. Tout revient si on enlève notre choix. C'est à dire que si je commence une mission avec 2500 gold et que je prend : 1 bâton des ténèbres a 1500 , armure 500 , 4 potion 400 gold. Il me reste : 100Gold. Une fois la mission terminé , je n'ai gagné que 50 gold et utilisé mes 4 potions. C'est pas grave ! Puisque j'ai maintenant un capitale de 150 gold +1 bâton des ténèbres a 1500 , armure 500 et 4 potions 400 gold qui ne se sont pas déduit de mes achat. J'ai , en vérité 2550 gold. C'est des achat permanent et interchangeable a souhait sans perte. Et ça .. c'est cool !

J'ai apprécié aussi le fait de pouvoir upgrade mon armure et de pouvoir incarner différents personnages.

En bref, le jeu est plein de problèmes ... Mais objectivement, il est plutôt cool ! :D Je le conseille !

author: {'steamid': '76561198041949592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 605, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1490405026}
review:
Hey everyone and this is my review about the game!

This is a really old action rpg  game.



[h1]Interface/Menu/Settings[/h1]

2 Different Campaigns.
There is a difficulty settings available.
You are able to play with your controller.
There are some different resolution sizes available.
You can play in windowed mode or fullscreen mode.
There is a brightness volume slidebar available.
There is a sound volume slidebar available.
There is a music volume slidebar available.
You are able to toggle Blood, Damage indicators or subtitles.

[h1]About the game.[/h1]

The game is really old as the game is released in the year 2003. This is a simple RPG action game with subjectives and other situations. The game could be really buggy at times or something will happen and you will raise your eyebrow. If you grew up and played this game in your childhood then you will know what to expect. But if you do not know the game at all then i would consider to buy this game with a discount.

You are able to skip cutscenes.
There are different classes and characters to be unlocked.
Some parts has been voiced-over.
There are checkpoints available.
Graphics and soundtrack is okay.
Levels are short and sceneries are basically the same or bland.
Camera is third person and there is fall damage.
You are able to see the enemy Health bar.
Combat doesn't feel smooth and crossbow doesn't have a zoom-in which makes it difficult to use.
There are collectables in the game. You are able to find gold which you can use to upgrade things.

[h1]Other things.[/h1]

One orc was able to hold an entire battering ram all by himself to break down a door.

-------------------

I Give this game a 3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198181127026', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1573231946}
review:
Это тот самый момент, когда игра 2002 года намного лучше, чем некоторые недавние игры.
Стосовно сюжета..ниче не ясно и не стал заморачиваться, что там и куда. Сам геймплей уже затягивает, хоть он и состоит в том, что бы убить всех неприятелей и иногда помочь персонажам выбраться из передряги.
Графика как для игры 2002 года - потрясна. Текстуры нарисованы просто идеально. Да и сама игра хорошо проработана.
В общем, кто хочет вспомнить свое детство - играйте в эту игру. Это конечно не Принс Персии, но все же, игра класная. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197971224911', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1425093383}
review:
dunno why some people got these problems with ads popping up in their browser.
i dont got this once, and apart of that thing with the ads, the game is pretty great. Story isnt epic, graphics for today arent, too. But nevertheless i really enjoy playing it. Played it back in 2004 and now i am about to play though it a third time, even if the missions are totally the same and nothing changes i like to replay with another class. 
So i would say, the money is well spend here. Dunno if it goes for sale or not but even if not, 5€ arent that much for a few great hours. Enyoed it even more than most new games these days. 
Need some Enclave 2!

author: {'steamid': '76561198012882309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1425345190}
review:
UPDATED: Adware is removed but everything else stays (windowed mode/alttab crashing, etc). I'll give it a few days and if it's still gone I might recommend it, because it's a pretty OK rpg game basically. 

-

No matter how Enclave was as a game when it came out, all that is screwed up with this edition in a very rude and simple way.

As many here pointed out - when you run the game it first opens the browser automatically, by itself to Raven's Cry steam store page, another (new, latest) Topware game. It's basically a popup/spam/adware and the kind that hijacks your default browser to open an ad whether you like it or not. An ad that then runs trailer from that game in the background while this game runs on top.

This happens everytime game runs! If the game runs/loads before your browser, then you can't turn off Raven's Cry trailer and close that page because Alt+Tab or Win+D or Win+Tab is not working and the game crashes when those are used (Win7 Ultimate 64bit). Same thing when it's in windowed mode.

Very not cool, Topware, not cool. Why would you do this? This is pretty much anticonsumer as it can be.

So I would say "no" to this... [strike]at least until they remove this stupid spam, adware bs.[/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561198075220826', 'num_games_owned': 849, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1424420499}
review:
Get this game only if its really cheap!

Pros:
- Great voice acting
- Good level design
- Good sound effects
- Story is okay.....nothing great. Same things we see in the fantasy setting.
- Can play as good or evil
- Menu design

Cons:
- Clunky combat
- Predictable AI
- Only warrior class effective, rest are crap.
- Very generic enemy design
- Bad role playing elements
- Linear gameplay
- Many graphical glitches

Conclusion: Good game to play if you have nothing to play.

review: The game is cool the mechanics of the walking controls are it mayor downfall it is very hard to walk the controls seem to see restricions in the air or something making you walk very weird the game basically is the life long story: humas vs orcs you are a person who either didnt pay his taxes or avoided them since you start the game in a dungeon and someone says how can we trust him if he doesnt even pay his taxes then you got to fight with crosbow or sword usually being able to use bouth you can customize your setup like the modern cod system of more you left on one side more gold you use on the other apart from that the graphics arent great but the story is pretty neat as far i can tell in my little tiem playing the problem is since i own better quality games in the first mission failed i quited i tolerated the get back to checkpoint but not the bs all over again of the mission but great game also: i got it free on a giveaway and i get free cards!!! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197968809754', 'num_games_owned': 4034, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1424305361}
review:
Sinceramente non l'ho giocato neanche: ho solo sbloccato le carte.
E dagli screen sembrerebbe essere niente male.
Un'amica ne ha anche parlato bene...

Ma... un gioco che ogni volta che lo avvii apre la pagina Steam di un altro gioco dello stesso sviluppatore?
E quando lo chiudi ti apre altre 4 schermate di pubblicità?
Ne vogliamo parlare?

Mi fa passare la voglia sia di giocare questo, che di comprare altri giochi di questo sviluppatore.
Sì, incluso, e soprattutto, quello che provano a pubblicizzare aprendone ogni volta la schermata di Steam!
Davvero una cosa pessima.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178705821', 'num_games_owned': 1067, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1527211117}
review: 游戏提供了容易、中等和艰难三种等级，PC版的玩家可以自由地在任务进程中储存进度，除此之外本作还计划在每个关卡中设置一些重新开始游戏的地点，假如你在游戏中不幸“GAME OVER”的话，你可以在那里直接进入原关卡而不必从头来过――不过这需要耗费你一点金子的“门票”钱。经过改良以后的整个控制系统显得流畅自如，与游戏的场景构架配合自然妥贴。游戏中那些格斗型的角色令人尤其印象深刻，他们仿佛有使不完的精力。当然你足够小心的话也可以避免白刃战。游戏提供了足够多的恢复剂，因此对于那些手脚灵活的玩家而言及时恢复不成为问题。但总体而言，游戏中重复性的战斗较多，有时候场面显得比较无序，而这种以劈砍为主的战斗并没有体现出很好的战略性。另外还有一个遗憾，就是游戏不支持多人对战。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025680527', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1424337309}
review:
When you start this game, it opens a web browser and brings you to the Steam page for Raven's Cry. They're advertising for another Topware game by employing pop-up advertising.

Yeah, I'm downvoting this game for this move, and if I ever get Raven's Cry in a bundle, I'm downvoting that as well.

You've soured my interest in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011546793', 'num_games_owned': 1147, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1424324868}
review:
Game has aged but it's still fun. Has a sort of arcade-y feel to it letting you have other character to play missions and replay them for more loot and gold. Get it on a big sale if you enjoy old style adventure fantasy games :)

Haters are going to hate, especially those with crappy comps or who have not even hit 17 years old or older - everyone with a steam account thinks they are a big critic now-a-days and that their googled terms to post up a review may look impressive, but ignore it. Youtube some game play before you let the critics steer you from this little gem.

Even if the gem doesn't shine as brightly as others, it still has some worth and worth your time to check it out :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197994896116', 'num_games_owned': 2329, 'num_reviews': 1481, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1424460323}
review:
Игра моего детства. Может и короткая, зато сколько я любви и тяги испытывал к ней. Проходя её в разных вариациях, по разные стороны баррикад, я обожал тот фантастический мир. К моему глубокому сожалению потом я забыл её, и единственное что мог я вспомнить - это лавового персонажа и обтянутую латексом злодейку. Я считаю игру dark fantasy, а игры данного под-жанра любимы на веку миллионами игроков. Те же самые Dark souls, Disciples и шедевральный Dragon age. 

Не зачем врать - игра стара. Старушка уже не будет блестать, так как уже давным давно запылилась и померла. 

Однако приятно снова пройти эту игру. Возможно снова... и снова... что бы освежить в своей памяти те радостные моментики.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174875746', 'num_games_owned': 603, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1425865899}
review:
Bought this game at a cut price; such a classic style Action RPG. Great combat, solid controls which are easy to learn and remember. Haven't got a controller to work with it yet, but with programs like XPadder, I don't see why it would be difficult; not necessary, but it shouldn't be too hard if you really dislike keyboard and mouse.

The only downside is the low graphical quality; which is understandable when you consider the 2003 release date. Character models are pretty good for the age, but landscape textures are very blurred. 
Resolution goes up to 1080p, which is awesome, and for a port, the options menu is pretty detailed.

I probably wouldn't recommend you buy this game at £3.99, since the game is so old now, that just sounds unnecessarily high. Like I said, I bought this in a sale and it cost me £1.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105178498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1424121452}

author: {'steamid': '76561198114195950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2841, 'last_played': 1588569957}
review:
Like any game out there, there are pro's & cons// I have to say that the AI & the engagement of enclave is a unique one, set in graphics while not the most detailed- I found have continued to age well... there are some very challanging (even infuriating) moments to this game: one of the more notable coming from a single witch doing her best catwoman impersonation from a set of roof tops...

its not a game that will particularly punish you for one mistake, but one that feels rewarding for having played it

hack n slash, magic, ranged weapons, even lighting your enemies on fire with grease bombs & watching as they wither at your feet... if you dont enjoy simple combat, then this isnt your game... lots of fun can come from just exploring areas to find all the booty (and deal with the enemies that spawn for grabbing the goods) there are times that it can even feel unfair... but it is after all, just a game; one I happen to enjoy- & for $5 USD... i believe you will too

author: {'steamid': '76561198165278640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1424536339}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030250363', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1424023468}
review:
I don't set my bar very high when I buy an obscure fantasy game for under $5 bucks. The odd unexpected gem, occasional clever art design, or just experiencing the personal projects of earnest developers. Enclave is none of those. I've only played through maybe the first third of the Light campaign (there's an entire second one that you need to unlock), but my patience is officially dried up.

The game starts with a lengthy cutscene that could have just as easily been titled "How Not to Write a Fantasy Story 101," opening up a quasi-mystical looking tome while a bored-sounding woman rambles on about the setting's origin story, throwing in some made-up fantasy words like "Dreg'atar" every third word in a deseperate effort to alienate the audience before the game even starts. (Tip for writers: foreign-sounding words are the deep end of the pool. The bigger the plot point the less likely you want to have to pull out a glossary to understand it.)

Once the game starts it's a pretty bog-standard sloppy hack-and-slasher, paving through orcs and goblins because of course you are. Survival can get pretty finnicky as the clunky combat controls make tapdancing around your opponent the best means of defense, and occasionally an unpredictable exploding setpiece can kick you back to the start of the level. Still, not something I lost sleep over seeing as how it cost less than a dollar.

The quality just sort of slowly slides downhill from there. Ranged attacks are borderline useless as they require extreme precision, which in a game where no one ever sits still and your rate of fire is roughly the same as horse droppings, means that at mid-ranges you'll miss, at close ranges you'll miss and get stabbed, and at long ranges you might hit and give your target a small papercut.

Basically every level introduces a new class to play as, most of which are slight variations on your standard sword/shield/crossbow Knight that you started with. The most distinct one (that I've unlocked, anyway) is the Druid, who takes any semblance of class balance and crushes it between her gratuitously exposed thighs (you can unlock armor with pauldrons, but not pants. How does that make sense?). Her most basic staff summons spectral ravens that home in on their target and has a secondary power to summon an elemental as a disposable meatshield, and her mana restores so fast it basically serves only to slightly limit your rate of fire.

Now if this were a sensibly balanced game, the average class would be able to plow through levels with moderate difficutly and the hilariously overpowered Druid would just sort of wander through spamming magic like you snuck Starkiller into a game of Star Wars Battlefront. But this isn't a sensibly balanced game, and the clumsy controls will have your melee characters limping with no potions inside of five minutes, basically giving you the options of "play Druid or get really familiar with the first room of each level."

My patients burned up around level seven, which seemed easy enough like all the rest: wander around murdering ugly green people, grab loot, find exit. Unfortunately, the level is also littered with archer assassins, who use the same burst arrows as your Huntress class, but with unlimited ammo and impeccable aim. They can, and will, take you from full health to dead in one shot before you can even make out their silhouette through the game's heavy fog, and in a game where each level has MAYBE two checkpoints, there's only so many times I can try and play Russian Roulette with trying to snipe them through the fog before I give up and chuck the game in the trash.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019205444', 'num_games_owned': 4251, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 848, 'last_played': 1423613782}
review:
Enclave is a gem of a game from the original X-Box era back in 2003. Its a third or first person medieval fantasy hack and slash with engaging combat and exceptional environments. For the rogue in all us there is a dark campaign where you play as several evil classes like assassin, berserker, lich and sorceress to name a few. If there are any good hearts out there, you also have the light campaign with their human counterpart classes such as knight, huntress, druid, wizard and half-ling. Each campaign lasted me a fun and joyous seven hours. At the start of each level you select your class and assign their equipment from the money you have. Nothing is permanently bought, so if you want expensive armor and a weak weapon with a few potions, you can do it or if zero potions, expensive weapons and armor is more to your liking go for it. The money is never spent, just assigned. These classes, play styles and different equipment go a long way to making each play through different, even if its your twentieth time on a level.

So why is this game so good? Let's start with the controls and movement. While this was an X-Box game, there doesn't seem to be controller support. You're stuck with your keyboard and rebindable keys. Its more than that though, your character seems to have a good sense of movement. You'll climb ladders, duck to crawl through tunnels, jump up boxes and over collapsed bridges. Even jump from rooftop to rooftop. Each class has its own speed. For the most part the heroes of the light campaign feel slower than their dark counterparts. Knights and berserkers move slow, while half-lings and goblins are the fastest. There is no run button, heroic classes are so slow that it really feels like you need to fight.

Getting there is half the fun, but along the way you'll of course find enemies and you've got the fantastic combat to take them out with. I can't call it deep combat so much as its fun. Each class can have a melee weapon that you really just mouse click bash to flail it around. Each weapon has its own strength, speed and range. Others have enchantments that will light enemies on fire. Most classes also have a shield too. Hold the right mouse button to have your shield up to block arrows and wow you will be blocking a lot of arrows. With some enemies that can fire a shotgun of bolts at you, it becomes mandatory if you're going to survive at close range.

To add some depth there, each time your shield gets bashed, that will knock it away for a split second leaving you open to attack. So if two archers time it just right they can break through your defenses. This goes for enemies with shields too. They're just like you, when their shield is up, you need to knock it down to hurt them.

Wizards, sorceresses, lich and druids have magic. Each magician has a magic meter that refills over time.  So if you run out from fire balling an enemy, you've got to wait, where the enemies see your weakness and will rush at you. You can equip two spell staffs, so you have a variety there in the level. A lot of the spells make the game easier. Plenty of them seek out enemies and turn in the air to hit them. Instead of a shield, the right mouse will raise a force field, but I never used it that much, since mages are such long range classes. Some staffs also have a summoning ability to raise an ally to help you. Oh and the spells can't get blocked. You still take damage.

Form there, non magic classes can also have a long range bow or cross bow. Even the knight and grenaders can use them, but you need to equip them at the start of each level, you can't just find one. I've gotta say crossbows and bows are far too difficult to accurately hit anything. Sure melee enemies running to you will take arrows til they're dead. Its shooting the other archers that becomes incredibly difficult. They can dodge arrows just as good as any human player. Its difficult to accurately hit them, so to compensate, there are several different tricks. You can load several bolts into a bow at once by pressing the right mouse button. Then release so one of them will hit its target if not all to instantly kill a close enemy. There are also fire bolts that will ignite enemies or the ground on fire. The abilities add some interesting facets to the game when you're forced to play as an assassin for the dark campaign's original character.

You have a quick health potion button that really plays into combat, because you need to chug the potion. Its not just instant energy, so if you're getting beaten to death, you need to hide and chug the potion before you can attack or defend again. It adds a lot to the combat and gives the enemies a better chance.

You'll need to unlock the classes as you go through the game. This means you'll be rescuing your comrades in their levels. With them freed, they'll temporarily aide you, fight shoulder to shoulder with you and guide you to the next part. They can die too, but as long as you've saved them and complete the level, they're unlocked.

Enclave puts you into incredible environments and assets are not used from level to level. So each level has a completely different look and feel. Crypts, tombs, caves, castles, lava caverns, shadowy towns, human towns. There is a ton of variety here. Between the light and dark campaigns only a few levels get reused among the two. Even if it is a shared level, you start from the opposite end of it, to make it feel fresher. The levels feel like they're just the right amount of time. Each level has plenty of exploration and a lot of levels feel open enough where you can look around without feeling like you're forced down a corridor. They never overstay their welcome. I never think of it as a chore, because there's always something new and beautiful to see around every corner.

The pre rendered cut scenes and menus are pretty dated with low resolution quality so they don't look as gorgeous as the game itself. Not that the game itself is high definition, but over a decade later it still looks amazing. The only thing lacking are the ground textures. Grassy fields could have used Oblivion style grass, but for a game that came out when Morrowind did it still looks better than its contemporaries.

Its not all roses and sunshine in this dark enchanted world. The game goes from a fun treat and knuckles down on you in later levels to beat you down. I appreciated the challenge, even if some levels took me five minutes to make it across a bridge. If you die, you need to restart the level. To balance it out, if you can make it to a checkpoint, you will respawn there when you die. There's just one catch. You need enough gold collected in that level to respawn. I'm thankful for the checkpoints even at a cost. Having each revive cost gold gives you incentive to return to each level after you complete it. Oh by the way, you only keep the gold if you beat the level. So if you died ten times, you spent one hundred gold, so you can return to the level, not die and get an extra hundred gold to spend. Assuming you collected what you had before. That's the beauty with all the exploration, you can find things or miss them.

You won't get limited to combat, there are some puzzles and a few brief, yet fun turret sections that don't tie you to the turrets. The bosses are giant and feel engaging without being overwhelming or frustrating. A giant dragon, a huge lava monster and the mega evil boss has you shooting its hanging heart. If that wasn't enough for you, there are unlockable mini games that are actually fun. You'll find maps in levels that will unlock games like a survival mode and a cool turret gallery.

The music is also something to take note of. Its great and really fits the medieval epicness of the game. Its beautiful and touching, but with big and bold moments too.

Once again, this is just a gem of a game that I would have paid full price for when it was $50. Thanks to someone from Sweden for giving me the game!

review: Well, first of all, don't expect anything particular from this game. I did, and the game is just something absolutely different. I expected it to be some kind of third person RPG Gothic-like.... actually it's a hack'n'slash oldie that's somehow unbelievably crappy, but kind of intresting at the same time. I can't really recommend this game, but it's 5€. About 50 cents when special, so what can you lose? Try for yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001285557', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 820, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 820, 'last_played': 1424703801}
review:
This game is quite old, and yes, it crashes sometimes (Actually now seems fixed by removing v sync) frame rate is embarassing same is the camera angle, but still I think the game itself is quite enjoyable: Many characters to play with, many weapons, 2 different campaigns.
The graphics are not that bad for a game of more than 10 years ago, and some effects and plot twists are almost surprising.
It has even the right level of difficulty. In particular, it is damn hard to find all the coins in all levels, but doing so is unsuitable and annoying 'cause of backtracking.
I am actually enjoying playing it again after so much time. It was one of the first game in bought as a 11 years old :')
Totally worth it for 1 $ on Steam (actually 0,65 € in my country).

75/100

Update: Each time you start the game a browser page open up with raven cry page, really annoying !!

author: {'steamid': '76561198105979486', 'num_games_owned': 727, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1627142580}
review:
[h1] Анклав, покрытый пылью . . . [/h1]

С грустью и печалью пишу этот отзыв... Не то чтобы я любил или был фанатом Enclave, но в далёком 2003 - 2004 году я с удовольствием часами играл в проект [url=starbreeze.com] Starbreez Studios [/url]. 

Причём проходил вдоль и поперёк обе компании, собирая словно жадный лепрекон горшочки с золотом и открывая секретные уровни. И вот спустя десять лет я решил поностальгировать и вновь окунуться в этот фэнтезийный мир.

[i] Однако, примерно через 30 ~ 60 минут игрового времени, я понял - что-то тут не так: [/i]

[list]
[*]Рубить врагов стало совсем не по фану
[*]Собирать спрятанное золото и драгоценные камни стало не интересно
[*]Сюжет, который и так хромал на обе ноги, начал казаться не просто "инвалидом" а настоящим "овощем"
[*]Многочисленные баги в игре перестали смешить, а стали лишь раздражать
[*]Все игровые персонажи превратились в ещё более безликих болванчиков
[*]Богатый выбор оружия перестал радовать глаз
[*]Геймплей одеревенел до неузнаваемости
[/list]

Но я продолжал играть, в надежде что вот-вот меня накроет волна воспоминаний и я вновь почувствую ту необъяснимую "магию" Enclave, которая так завораживала в прошлом... К сожалению хватило моего настроя лишь на 10 уровней. После победы над первым БОССОМ, и пары уровней после, меня словно осенило - [u] Enclave больше не цепляет! [/u] Я понял, что лучше будет остановиться сейчас, чем мучить себя дальнейшим прохождением, разрушая те тёплые воспоминания прошлого...

author: {'steamid': '76561198138609468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1428139234}
review: старючая игра. эх. ностальгия просто. перепройти сесть посидеть - одно удовольствие. конечно - сейчас это совсем не конкурент ничему. даже задумываться не стоит. но когда-то перепрошёл её вдоль и поперёк. хотя сейчас и посмотришь на неё - ну нет особой настоящей изюминки в ней как-то. это не Врата Балдура, с её диалогами, это не что-то другое. но поиграть можно. неплохая песчинка истории игростроительства, так сказать. навряд сейчас сможет кого-то привлечь из тех, у кого её не было раньше, но для тех, кто хочет увидеть маленький шедевр старых лет- вполне вещь.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986409488', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1426783107}
review:
I only don't recommend this game because it's full of errors, too much unrecoverable errors for me. 
Graphics are ok, sound too and gameplay is addicted but getting stuck with errors that make your game crash never is good.
If you have a recent mouse you have to put down your polling rate to 125Hz because it get's buggy everytime you turn your character; If you have more than 1 Core CPU you have to set your affinity to 1 core (core 0) in the task manager;
Still not enough, you will find the unrecoverable error in start of some missions and the random errors you will find in your quest for Light or Dark path.

So, in my point of view from 0 to 10. This will get a 3.5

author: {'steamid': '76561198036493623', 'num_games_owned': 1084, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1446836350}
review:
Enclave to jedna z zapomnianych gier lecz nawet w 2015 roku daje rade. 

Grafika jak na 2003r prezentuje się świetnie, textury są lepsze niż w Call of Duty Ghosts a i samo oświetlenie jak i fizyka prezentuje wyższy poziom niż napisane wcześniej ścierwo.

Muzyka jest poprawna ALE jest jeden FELER w całej grze są TYLKO 2 UTWORY!!! wyobraźcie sobie że przez całe 10H będziecie słuchać tego samego CAŁY CZAS (Polecam wyciszyć muzyke bo szlak potrafi wziąść po 3H).

Grywalność jest przeciętna zwłaszcza w pierwszej Kampani, dosłownie myślałem że gram w crapa czy inny syf ale naszczęście w połowie gra zmienia się w całkiem fajny Action TPP a  druga kampania to już INNA LEPSZA GRA serio wygląda na to żę drugą kampanie robił ktoś inny bo prezentuje ona 1000x wyższy poziom niż pierwsza kampania. 

Fabularnie średno powiedziałbym że słabo, to typowa historyjka o ratowaniu świata przed demonem. 

Wykonanie techniczne jest dobre jednak odradzam grać w DX8.1 bo gra się wywala co jakiś czas, granie w OpenGL nie powoduje żadnych problemów. 

Ogólnie Enclava to taki średniak ale całkiem smaczny jak nie ma w co grać to można pograć ;)

Grafika 8/10
Dźwięk 2/10 (Te 2 utwory są całkiem nie złe ale jednak jest ich TYLKO 2 )
Grywalność 7/10
Fabuła 3/10
Optymalizacja 8/10 (Crashe w trybie DX 8.1)
Ogólnie 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198023461879', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1422589527}
review: Adware was added to the game by the new publishers Topshelf, graphics aren't working correctly, GoG version works correctly without Adware, Valve should be ashamed to let this tripe adorn their shelves. 1/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198108470916', 'num_games_owned': 435, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1409784959}
review:
Buggy game, personally i'd give it a 5/10, For the sole reason that the game for it's time is pretty decent, If it was 2004, I'd say it was horrible. The two years are distuinguished hugely. But like i said for it's time it's a really good game. It's... I'd like to say a learning curve because though it's a old game most of the people who play games nowadays don't realize how much more dependant as a player you need to be to finish a game. Games really really easy. But loses interest when the first bug hits you, which is pretty much the first "quest" or "Tutorial" seeming where it starts it ends up glitching. The scenario is great though. In the end overall i'd recommend buying it. 

I bought this game because it was cheap at the time, An the results of buying it is what i expected from a older game. I didn't feel any nostalgia from it. But the art is pretty good for when it was made as i said. An overall it's a good game. I'll update this review if i ever decide to re-play the game, an have a less hypacritical oppinion. (Only played less then an hour an you get stuck due to a glitch on the first area not enough "help" or information on playing the game)

author: {'steamid': '76561198117742654', 'num_games_owned': 1489, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 645, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1465582435}
review:
Ovviamente, guardando al momento al panorama videoludico, oltre a essere un gioco con i suoi anni sulle spalle, si tratta di un titolo con meccaniche e scelte di design/progettazione e sviluppo in generale che ormai da diverso tempo non ho visto più nei titoli da me giocati.
Non ho completato tutte le missioni secondarie, cercato tutte le monete e quant'altro; mi sono limitato a giocare la storia, sia "Luce" che "Oscurità".
Enclave ha i suoi difetti, come tutti i giochi. Per me è stato soprattutto frustrante capire le meccaniche dei combattimenti, con colpi mancati e innumerevoli partenze dai vari checkpoint.
Tuttavia, consiglio questo gioco perché è stato divertente sotto molti aspetti e così dovrebbe essere un gioco (difetti inclusi).
Infine, in tutta onestà mi dispiace non abbia un seguito, davvero.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068769124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1467495926}
review:
So I got this game for $0.82 during the final days of a christmas sale, and I thought "for 82 cents I don't expect much. I didn't get more than about 8-15 minutes in before I got bored and gave up to go play some Super Hexagon instead. Controls are acceptable. atmosphere, which is glorified in the trailer and the description, is as atmospheric and interesting as a generic action/adventure game of the later 90's. The actual gameplay is fine, the graphics are quite dated and the overall quality of the game is subpar, but not bad. It's not a matter of graphics or controls with this game, so much as its fault being in its boring landscapes, strangely disjointed combat and utterly generic feel. Nothing interesting, new, innovative or even remotely eye-catching is done with this game. It rides its way comfortably into the safe zone of action/adventure gaming set in a bland and uninteresting medevial world devoid of anything that might make it stand out of the hundreds of its boring and generic cousins at the bottom of the value priced games you find in a cardboard bin at a department store, left to wallow in all they're boring blandness. for $0.82, it is ok, but for full price of $5.60, I think I would rather go have some tempura dynamite sushi..

Better that awful, but can't muster the strength to jump over that "Berlin Wall of Generic Gaming" fence - 5.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198070371986', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1702575023}
review:
Análise em PT-BR: Esse é um bom jogo, o jogo está indo muito bem para mim, não é um jogo com uma história foda, não é um jogo com gráficos incríveis, mas é um jogo divertido. Tem uma customização de personagem não muito boa, mas dá para você upar seu personagem, ele não é um RPG comum, pois não existe XP para ele, você apenas faz as missões e consegue moedas de ouro para ir comprando armas, escudos, bestas e tudo mais. Aconselho para quem gosta de jogar sozinho e curte um pouco de RPG. Por  enquanto, estou jogando com um Cavaleiro. Devo dizer também para quem não sabe inglês, não existe tradução para Português, então aconselho depois dar uma olhada na tradução. Seria ótimo ver uma remasterização desse jogo, ou um remake, ou até mesmo um Enclave 2. :) Nota: 8/10

Review in English: This is a good game, the game is going very well for me, isn't a game with a fucking story, isn't a game with amazing graphics, but it is a fun game. It has a customization of your caracther, but isn't incredible, but gives you level up your character. Remember, this game isn't a ordinary RPG, because there is not XP for it, you just do the missions and get gold coins to go buying weapons, shields, crossbows and everything. Advise those who like to play alone and enjoys a bit of RPG. For now, I'm playing with a Knight. I must also say those who do not know English, don't have translation for Portuguese, then, I advise then take a look at translation. It would be great to see a remastering of this game, or a remake, or even a Enclave 2. :) Grade: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198000943417', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1434717200}
review:
There's a reason this game goes as low as $0.69.

From what I played, it hardly felt like an RPG since progression and events seem pretty static since it's mission based. This game would be fun playing if this were still 2003, but now it just doesn't hold up.

By all means, the game itself isn't bad, but it just felt like theres much better games in the genre that just play a bit better if you're willing to spend a bit more.

Also it kinda has slight performance issues, so theres that as well. Oh, and it has a built-in advertisement that opens your browser without your permission and shows you a newer game that the devs made. That was a huge turn off for me.

Get it if you like fantasy RPGs but have don't have a nice computer and not that much money/nothing else in your library.
